com.flurry.android.tumblr

Interface PostListener


  • public interface PostListener
    The listener for TextPost and PhotoPost. To receive success or failure notifications for your post, please implement the this listener and register it using setListener in TextPost or PhotoPost.
    Author:
    2009-2015 Flurry, Inc. All Rights Reserved
    See Also:
    Flurry Publisher Support Site

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPostFailure(String errorMessage)
      This method indicates that the post to Tumblr failed.
      void onPostSuccess(Long postId)
      This method indicates that the post to Tumblr was successfully created.

    • Method Detail

      • onPostSuccess

        void onPostSuccess(Long postId)
        This method indicates that the post to Tumblr was successfully created.
        Parameters:
        postId - The corresponding postId created on Tumblr.

      • onPostFailure

        void onPostFailure(String errorMessage)
        This method indicates that the post to Tumblr failed.
        Parameters:
        errorMessage - Friendly message explaining the reason for post failure.
